Saul Envies David

\w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w as|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* women danced, \w they|strong="H5221"\w* \w sang|strong="H6030"\w* out: “\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w has|strong="H7586"\w* \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w thousands|strong="H7233"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* tens \w of|strong="H5221"\w* \w thousands|strong="H7233"\w*.”

David Marries Michal

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, “\w Here|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w older|strong="H1419"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w Merab|strong="H4764"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* marriage. Only \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w battles|strong="H4421"\w*.” \w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* thinking, “\w I|strong="H5414"\w* need \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w raise|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*; \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.”
